name: paradox-anticheat
description: A utility to fight against malicious hackers on Bedrock Edition

scripts.copy:assets: cp -R animation_controllers/ animations entities/ functions/ CHANGELOG.md LICENSE manifest.json pack_icon.png README.md build
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run build && cd build; zip -0 -r Paradox-AntiCheat-v${npm_package_version}.mcpack ../build .
scripts.mkdir_win: @if exist build (rd /s /q build && mkdir build) else (mkdir build)
scripts.build_win: npm run mkdir_win 1>nul && node node_modules\typescript\bin\tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run copy_assets_win 1>nul
scripts.build_win_noscript: npm run mkdir_win 1>nul && npm run copy_assets_win 1>nul
scripts.zip_win: npm run clean_win && npm run build_win && @powershell Compress-Archive -Path \"build\*\" -DestinationPath \"build\Paradox-AntiCheat-v%npm_package_version%.zip\" -Force
scripts.dist_win: npm run clean_win && npm run format && npm run build_win 1>nul && npm run zip_win 1>nul && rename_win
